lead_paragraph: Recent injuries suggested Dale Steyn's best days could be behind him but it was the 33-year-old  who engineered victory for South Africa against New Zealand on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Fiery Steyn Getting Back to His Best for South Africa
headline.main: Fiery Steyn Getting Back to His Best for South Africa

snippet: Recent injuries suggested Dale Steyn's best days could be behind him but it was the 33-year-old  who engineered victory for South Africa against New Zealand on Tuesday....
